title: Can banned accounts not have posting rights on forums?
body:
There are 10 new threads every day about people who got perma-banned or 14 day temp banned
because they flamed/fed/trolled appealing on the forums saying they're totally innocent and they were banned wrongly. after reading their logs you see that they were clearly hard flaming.

Those posts usually get 10-20 downvotes depending on how much attention they caught.
They are cluttering the forums and quite frankly useless and not helpful. 

As for for the temp banned accounts - disable posting just for the ban period to let them cool off during their ban and not go flame on the forums immediately after they got banned.

We all know that the best way to deal with a wrongly banned account is to go straight to support ticket because no one on the forums can actually help you anyhow, so why not take away their posting rights altogether?
